text: Dirty Harry is a 1971 American crime thriller movie. It was produced and directed by Don Siegel. It was the first in the Dirty Harry series. Clint Eastwood plays the main role. Eastwood acts as a San Francisco Police Department Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callaghan, trying to catch a serial killer. The character is based on real life cop Dave Toschi hunting for the Zodiac Killer.Lead detective in unsolved San Francisco Zodiac killer case dies Dirty Harry was followed by four sequels: Magnum Force in 1973, The Enforcer in 1976, Sudden Impact in 1983 (directed by Eastwood), and The Dead Pool in 1988. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1971 crime movies Category:1971 thriller movies Category:1970s crime thriller movies Category:1971 action movies Category:1970s serial killer movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Buddy cop movies Category:Antisocial personality disorder in fiction Category:Movies about extortion Category:Movies about police officers Category:Chase movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Don Siegel
title: Dirty Harry
